description: JSON Schema for utility class in Elephant Lexicon

cooling_system_type.description: Refers to the type of cooling system used in the structure.

electrical_panel_capacity.description: Describes the amperage or capacity of the electrical panel, e.g. '100 Amp', '200 Amp'.

electrical_wiring_type.description: Specifies the type of electrical wiring used in the structure.

electrical_wiring_type_other_description.description: A free-form field for describing the electrical wiring type if Other is selected.

heating_fuel_type.description: Primary energy source used by the heating system.

heating_system_type.description: Refers to the type of heating system used in the structure.

hvac_condensing_unit_present.description: Indicates if an HVAC condensing unit is present, as visible externally.

hvac_unit_condition.description: Visible exterior condition of the HVAC condensing unit, if present.

hvac_unit_issues.description: Visual indicators of HVAC or external unit deterioration.

plumbing_system_type.description: Refers to the type of plumbing system used in the structure.

plumbing_system_type_other_description.description: A free-form field to capture detail when Other is selected for the plumbing system type.

public_utility_type.description: Refers to the type of public utility available to a structure.

request_identifier.description: Identifier value that should be substituted into the source HTTP request to retrieve this specific data.

sewer_type.description: Refers to the type of sewer used in the structure.

smart_home_features.description: List of smart home features installed in the property.

smart_home_features_other_description.description: Free-form description if any smart home features are not covered by the predefined list.

solar_inverter_visible.description: Whether a solar inverter box is visible on exterior or utility closet.

solar_panel_present.description: Indicates whether solar panels are installed on the structure.

solar_panel_type.description: Specifies the type of solar panel system.

solar_panel_type_other_description.description: A free-form field to describe the solar panel system when Other is selected.

source_http_request.description: HTTP request configuration for retrieving this data.

body.description: The body of the request, which may contain JSON or other data formats.

content-type.description: Content-Type header for the request, indicating the media type of the resource.

url.description: The URL endpoint for the request.

water_source_type.description: Refers to the type of water source used in the structure.

title: utility
